entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 3:59AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LONG DURATION PRECIPITATION EVENT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... A series of surface fronts will impact parts of Southcentral throughout the next several days with rain along the coast, a mix of rain/snow for parts of interior Kenai Peninsula, and snow at higher elevations. Precipitation is expected to be heaviest Thursday through Friday afternoon before gradually tapering off

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 6:43AM CST until February 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SIGNIFICANT LAKE ENHANCED SNOW NEAR LAKE MICHIGAN TONIGHT... .A strong upper level disturbance and cold northeast flow off lake Michigan will combine to produce significant snow accumulations across the lakeshore counties tonight. The snow may be heavy at times in the late evening and overnight hours. Travel will become hazardous due to poor visibility and snow covered roads.
